action.action-desc: Ms. Matsui (for herself, Mr. Calvert, Ms. Pingree, and Mr. Langworthy) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to reauthorize the diesel emissions reduction program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Diesel Emissions Reduction Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of diesel emissions reduction act
section.text: Section 797(a) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16137(a)) is amended by striking 2024 and inserting 2029.
